data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Barinas that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Barinas, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Barinas.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Barinas, Venezuela.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Barinas to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Barinas that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Barinas, Venezuela from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Barinas.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Barinas
location.cities_list: Barinas, Alto Barinas, Socopó, Ciudad Bolivia, Barinitas
